metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20272 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in privoxy before 3.0.32. An assertion failure could betriggered with a crafted CGI request leading to server crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20272` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.33-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: privoxy package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.33-1').
